fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A photo of the crater of Mount Vesuvius did not show Naples in the background, as the caption said. Castellammare di Stabia, about 20 miles south-east of the city of Naples, could be seen (Evacuation plan drawn up for town of Pompeii in case Vesuvius erupts, 19 December, page 33). • The EU’s budget in 2017 was €158bn, not €158m (Piketty leads call to tax the rich to create fairer Europe, 10 December, page 1). • Other recently corrected articles include: What stopped you applying to Oxbridge? Former Indian MP jailed for life over 1984 Sikh massacre Paul O’Brien obituary Beyond The Second Woman: road movie challenges ideas of female identity
